item.title: Tutorial: Mayhem bot – Part 1
item.description: In this guide, I will be building a Discord bot from scratch using only discord.js and a few open public APIs. I’ll also explain each step and discuss the reason for preference of a particular way of implementation over others. So, let’s get started. WHAT ARE WE BUILDING? Mayhem is a simple Discord bot that is aimed for entertainment and fun. It queries external public APIs for images, jokes, facts and definitions.
